Dumbarton 敦巴顿（在美国华盛顿）

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个形容词均有"哑的，不能说话的"之意。
means: dumb ： 可与mute换用，但dumb指根本没有说话能力或失去了说话能力。
mute ： 多指因后天疾病而引起的聋哑，有时也指因故不说话。

sentence.Network_en: The questions were set up to make her look dumb.
sentence.Network_cn: 问题这么设计，就是为了让她出丑。

sentence.Network_en: The snowy street, like the church, assumed a dumb, lifeless aspect.
sentence.Network_cn: 积雪覆盖的街道就像教堂一样，显得沉闷、毫无生气。

sentence.Network_en: An expression of dumb recognition wiggled across her features.
sentence.Network_cn: 她不语，从她脸上掠过的一丝表情可知她是认得的。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English, of Germanic origin; related to Old Norse dumbr and Gothic dumbs 'mute', also to Dutch dom 'stupid' and German dumm 'stupid'

encyclopedia.content: Alexandra Burke曲歌手简介 全名：Alexandra Imelda Cecelia Ewan Burke 中文译名： 亚历山大伊梅尔达 西西莉亚 尤恩 伯克 生日：1988.8.25 出生地：伦敦市伊斯灵顿区 身高：164cm 体重：47kg 获奖：第五季X-Factor冠军 歌词 Baby i'm loving your lips' cuz you know how to use them I wanna fall in your eyes but there's nothing behind them Look too good to eat' I just can't believe we can't talk about nothin You so

entry.def: Someone who is dumb is completely unable to speak.

entry.tran: (在某种场合下因愤怒或惊讶而)说不出话的,哑口无言的
entry.def: If someone is dumb on a particular occasion, they cannot speak because they are angry, shocked, or surprised.

example.ex: We were all struck dumb for a minute.
example.tran: 一时间我们惊讶得哑口无言。

entry.def: If you call a person dumb, you mean that they are stupid or foolish.

example.ex: I've met a lot of dumb people...
The questions were set up to make her look dumb.
example.tran: 问题这么设计，就是为了让她出丑。

entry.tran: 愚蠢的;令人心烦的;令人恼火的
entry.def: If you say that something is dumb, you think that it is silly and annoying.

example.ex: I came up with this dumb idea...

entry.tran: 无声的;无言的;不用言语表达的
entry.def: Something that is dumb is done or expressed without words.

example.ex: An expression of dumb recognition wiggled across her features.
example.tran: 她不语，从她脸上掠过的一丝表情可知她是认得的。

means.word_mean: 1. slow to learn or understand; lacking intellectual acuity;

sentences.sentence: "so dense he never understands anything I say to him"
"although dull at classical learning, at mathematics he was uncommonly quick"- Thackeray
"dumb officials make some really dumb decisions"
"he was either normally stupid or being deliberately obtuse"

means.word_mean: 3. lacking the power of human speech;
4. unable to speak because of hereditary deafness

list.explanation: [戏剧用语]无对白的杂耍歌舞节目(通常为一场演出的开场戏)

example.en: Only a dumh-bunny would full for that crap.
example.zh: 只有傻瓜蛋才会相信那种鬼话。

example.en: Sally is not a dumb-cluck，but she is sort of slow.
example.zh: 萨莉并不笨，不过她有点儿迟钝。

Sentence.sentence: The Home Depot approach to craftsmanship - simplify it, dumb it down, hire a contractor - is one signal that mastering tools and working with one's hands is receding in America as a hobby, as a valued skill, as a cultural influence that shaped thinking and behavior in vast sections of the country.
Your least-favorite reporter suggests a dumb story idea.

sentences.en: She is very kind to the dumb children.
He is dumb on the subject.
sentences.cn: 他对这个问题表示沉默。

sentences.en: It was dumb of you to say that.

jushi.english: She is very kind to the dumb children.
